snippet.title: The Past Within - Official Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist The Past Within now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1515210/The_Past_Within/ 

Are you ready to unlock The Past Within? Teaming up with a friend, travel through both past and future to piece together the mysteries surrounding Albert Vanderboom. Communicate what you see around you to help one another solve various puzzles and explore the worlds from different perspectives! 

The Past Within is an upcoming multiplayer point-and-click adventure taking place in the Rusty Lake universe. Next to PC & Mac, the game is also coming to IOS, Android and hopefully console!

Please keep in mind that the development of this game is still in an early stage: we still have a long way to go before we can communicate a release date! Stay tuned on our social media, our blog or on Steam for more information / development logs. 

Trailer credits: 
Director / Cinematographers: Junior Hoyng and Niklaas Hoyng (http://www.hoyngimages.com) 
Editing: Julia Popova (http://www.studiopopova.com) 
Music and sounddesign: Victor Butzelaar (http://www.victorbutzelaar.com) 
Produced by: Rusty Lake

Like and follow:
Instagram: https://instagram.com/rustylakecom/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/rustylakecom
Twitter: https://twitter.com/rustylakecom
Discord: https://www.discord.gg/rustylake
And subscribe to our mailing list: http://eepurl.com/bhphw1
